creator: Maxwell_Smart@ThePentagon.com
text:
When the DefaultType directive is not in the httpd.conf file, pages are sent
with the Content-Type header set to text/plain. The documentation
<URL:http://httpd.apache.org/docs/mod/core#defaulttype> says "Default:
DefaultType text/html".
Thanks for the report!  This is now fixed.
creator: slive@apache.org
